All I'm dealing 
with is headaches.

1441.text:
I'm gonna step outta here, and
I'm gonna look at my phone,

1443.text:
and there's gonna be seven
things I have to deal with

1444.text:
that isn't a fun 
thing to deal with.

1446.text:
So to come home and pour that
on my wife isn't interesting.

1450.text:
I don't have 
anything positive to say.

1451.text:
On a micro level, 
it's all negative.

1453.text:
It's the macro 
level that's awesome.

1457.text:
Great meeting you.
- Thank you, brother,

1459.text:
- [Larry] This is the
first of many meetings.
